pages.text: 69|9|aur kiya yahee paap firaun ne aur jo usake poorv the tatha jinakee bastiyaan aundhee kar dee gayeen.
69|10|unhonne nahin maana apane paalanahaar ke rasool ko. antatah, usane pakad liya unhen, kadee pakad.
69|11|hamane, jab seema paar kar gaya jal, to tumhen savaar kar diya naav[1] mein.
69|12|taaki ham bana den use tumhaare lie ek shikshaaprad yaadagaar aur taaki surakshit rakh len ise sunane vaale kaan.
69|13|phir jab phoonk dee jaayegee soor (narasingha) mein ek phoonk.
69|14|aur uthaaya jaayega dharatee tatha parvaton ko, to donon choor-choor kar diye jaayenge[1] ek hee baar mein.
69|15|to usee din honee ho jaayegee.
69|16|tatha phat jaayega aakaash, to vah us din ksheen nirbal ho jaayega.
69|17|aur farishte usake kinaaron par honge tatha uthaaye honge aapake paalanahaar ke arsh (sinhaasan) ko apane oopar us din, aath farishte.
69|18|us din tum allaah ke paas upasthit kiye jaoge, nahin chhupa rah jaayega tumamen se koee.
69|19|phir jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr daayen haath mein, vah kahegaah ye lo mera karmapatr padho.
69|20|mujhe vishvaas tha ki main milane vaala hoon apane haisaab se.
69|21|to vah apane man chaahe sukh mein hoga.
69|22|uchch shrenee ke svarg mein.
69|23|jisake phalon ke guchchhe jhuk rahe honge.
69|24|(unase kaha jaayegaah) khao tatha piyo aanand lekar usake badale, jo tumane kiya hai vigat dinon (sansaar) mein.
69|25|aur jise diya jaayega usaka karmapatr usake baayen haath mein, to vah kahegaah haay! mujhe mera karmapatr diya hee na jaata
69|26|tatha main na jaanata ki kya hai mera haisaab
69|27|kaash meree maut hee nirnaayak[1] hotee
69|28|nahin kaam aaya mera dhan.
69|29|mujhase samaapt ho gaya, mera prabhutv.
69|30|(aadesh hoga ki) use pakado aur usake gale mein tauq daal do.
69|31|phir narak mein use jhonk do.
69|32|phir use ek janjeer jisakee lambaee sattar gaz hai, mein jakad do.
69|33|vah eemaan nahin rakhata tha mahimaashaalee allaah par.
69|34|aur na prerana deta tha daridr ko bhojan karaane kee.
